name: GOETIA (itch)
description:
GOETIA:

A basic platformer themed around the demons of the Ars Goetia. Collect five coins per level and then reach the door to win. 

A work in progress.

Featuring Real Goetic Demons:

Current State:
  • 6 levels including 3 boss fights.
  • Permadeath which sends the player back to the main menu.
  • Tracking for no-hit and all-enemy-kill runs.
To Be Added:
  • More levels including 1 additional boss fights. 
  • In game time tracking per level and across a whole run.
  • Physics rework to make combat more precise
  • Boss AI rework to make boss battles more challenging. 

Music by Patrick De Arteaga
